name: Isekai Alchemist
description:
I'm sorry for this...

I'm not a bad person, I swear. I just... I... don't have another option. So please, don't open it. I just hope that if you open it, you don't blame me. I mean, I'm warning you, right? A bad person would do that? No. I just... don't have other option. So if someone open it, it is not my fault, right?

It's your choice. And I'm sure you will be fine, right? I mean, I'm sure you can handle your decision...

-----
Developer message: Don't worry about the introduction. This game is cute and there is nothing dark in it. Or at least I hope you find it cute. It is a mini game (it took me less than a moth to make), and it's far from perfect. But it's an idea for a bigger game (with more kanjis to learn), so if you have any suggestions about what you would like to do, please, let me know.
